results.title: Metformin: A potential adjunct for treatment of systemic mastocytosis
results.text_hl: None of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ before a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Mastocytosis_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D034721 @@@SM@@@ had developed @<m>DISEASE_Mastocytosis_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D034721 @@@AdvSM@@@.

citations.NLM: Butterfield JH, Bartemes K. Metformin: A potential adjunct for treatment of systemic mastocytosis J Allergy Clin Immunol Glob. 2024 Feb;3(1):100186. PMID: 38089917

results.title: Metformin-mediated effects on mesenchymal stem cells and mechanisms: proliferation, differentiation and aging.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has shown great potential in the treatment of various @<m>DISEASE_Mastocytosis_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D034721 @@@systemic diseases@@@ except for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ in recent years, and the mechanisms are involved with antioxidant stress, anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@, and induced autophagy, etc.

citations.NLM: Liu X, Li Z, Liu L, Zhang P, Wang Y, Ding G. Metformin-mediated effects on mesenchymal stem cells and mechanisms: proliferation, differentiation and aging. Front Pharmacol. 2024;15():1465697. PMID: 39193338
